services.title: Our Services
services.intro: We provide professional repair services for phones, tablets and laptops.

iphone.title: iPhone Repair
iphone.description: Screen repair, battery replacement, water damage repair and more for all iPhone models.

android.title: Android Repair
android.description: We repair screens, software, batteries, and components for most Android brands.

tablet.title: Tablet & Laptop Repair
tablet.description: Screen issues, software problems, battery replacements, and hardware repairs for all devices.

repair.screenDesc: Cracked or broken screen? We replace it with a high-quality screen.
repair.batteryDesc: Battery drains quickly or won’t charge? We replace it with a new one.
repair.backDesc: Broken back cover? We repair it like new.
repair.housingDesc: Replace damaged housing with a new one.
repair.backCameraDesc: Repair the back camera functionality and quality.
repair.frontCameraDesc: Repair or replace the front camera.
repair.lensDesc: Replace scratched or broken camera lens.

bookingForm.name: Your Name
bookingForm.successMessage: Your booking has been successfully submitted!
bookingForm.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
bookingForm.closedWeekend: We are closed on Saturdays and Sundays.

about.title: About Digicity
about.p1: Digicity was founded in 2021 by Abdishakuur Mohamed Nuur to meet the growing demand for professional and reliable device repair services.
about.p2: We provide fast, precise, and customer-focused repair services for phones, tablets, and laptops using high-quality spare parts and modern tools.
about.p3: Customer satisfaction, transparent pricing, and high-quality workmanship are the foundation of everything we do.

list.three: Transparent pricing and excellent customer service

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We would love to hear from you. Send us a message below.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.response: Your message has been received. We will get back to you shortly.
